quotes.text: Don't make things too complicated. Try to relax, enjoy every moment, get used to everything.
Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
The time to relax is when you don't have time for it.
A holiday is an opportunity to journey within. It is also a chance to chill, to relax. It is when I switch on my rest mode.
Music - it's motivational and just makes you relax.
Sometimes the most important thing in a whole day is the rest we take between two deep breaths.
Life isn't as serious as the mind makes it out to be.
Give your stress wings and let it fly away.
Sometimes the most productive thing you can do is relax.
Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.
Loafing needs no explanation and is its own excuse.
For fast-acting relief, try slowing down.
